website_summaries.verdict: AT&T customers looking for a sturdier handset will find the Galaxy S6 Active a worthy upgrade to an already top-caliber phone.
pros: The Samsung Galaxy S6 Active's long-lived battery and resistance to water, dust and scuffs make it more appealing than the regular Galaxy S6
Its shortcut button conveniently launches two different apps of your choice
cons: Built of plastic with thick edging, the S6 Active isn't a particularly attractive device, certainly not as glamorous as metal or glass phones
No expandable storage option means you're locked to 32GB

customer_reviews.title: This is one of the BEST Samsung Actives of them all! I have bought several!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent phone. It is very durable, nice design and user friendly. I had the S5 Active that was great and when I got this S6 Active, they are miles apart. There is a better operating system and after a few software updates, it is just as good as the S7 Active. The only downside between the S7 Active and the S6 Active is the S7 has a speaker in the front and it gives you better sound...naturally. Other than that, this thing is a work horse! I have bought several more S6 Actives for the different lines I have with AT&T and for the rest of the family.
customer_reviews.author: Chicago Bulls Fan 70

customer_reviews.title: Buggy phone. battery was atrocious. Good buy for price.
customer_reviews.text: Ultimatly it was a great price. The phone was full of bugs with bluetooth, battery life, erratic. But i was able to remove the screen and put it on my old s6 active.. Although the screen has half screen burn in it works fine and is t a huge deal. The price was great and i was able to restore my old phone to all its glory. I may buy another one. These were the best phones
customer_reviews.author: D&J Burton

customer_reviews.title: US Cellular: Excellent price and shipping! So gangsta!
customer_reviews.text: I got this from US Cellular. It's in great condition (of course) and so far I'm loving it. My main review is for US Cellular, who rocked it on the shipping and price! The expected delivery date was between tomorrow (Thursday) and Monday. I've already got it setup and in its case. In the case, it's a little bigger than I was anticipating but after 4 ruined phones in a row, it's time for safer over more convenient. Very happy so far with the Active features and a nice upgrade from my S5.
customer_reviews.author: Joe E

customer_reviews.title: WARNING crap phone with horrible customer service.
customer_reviews.text: If someone calls there is no sound for them to hear, just got on friday. I am waiting for a response we will see what happens I will update Update after two weeks I've had no response from them. I do not recomend ordering from them.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth olle

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Disappointed, my teenage son saved up and bought this phone for himself, he got the active thinking it would be more durable and in 3 weeks the screen cracked from carrying it on his front pocket. He had an S3 for over 4 years and was excited about his upgrade now it is going to cost almost as much to fix it as he paid for it 😔
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My new phone is AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: I love my new phone! It's fast and gives me more capability I could have imagined. The camera is great, the processor is super fast. I love streaming on my new phone. It's easy to use and has a myriad of settings so I have been able to personalize it. This is the second one I have purchased, the first was for my husband. I plan to purchase another soon for my son. We are all excited to have virtually indestructible, waterproof phones. I would definitely buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Ross

customer_reviews.title: Dont buy
customer_reviews.text: Looked great coming out of the box. Accidentally got the hassle free packaging and I wanted the Samsung box so my bad. But took two hours at AT&T just to get the simple card to work. When it did work it was half good and half bad service No 4g No LTE AT&T thought I stole it or something and after 1 DAY the phone still dies pretty quick and no one is getting my text or phone calls or anything over ATT Network Very disappointed have to go to att and buy brand new for 700$ now but YOU GET WHAT YOU PAY FOR !!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jacoby j.

customer_reviews.title: meh
customer_reviews.text: ok, so i got it and its a nice phone, a little beat up but looks great. solid battery life but for the life of my i cant get a steady wifi connection on this thing. love the suite of apps but i'll be returning it for a s7 or s8 active.
customer_reviews.author: lunchbox

customer_reviews.title: JUNK AVOID JUNK AVOID JUNK AVOID
customer_reviews.text: COULD NOT MAKE IT PASSED INITIALIZATION PROCESS OUT OF THE BOX BEFORE IT STARTED TO SLOW DOWN, STOP THE PROCESS, AND NEED TO RESTART. PHONE COMPLETELY UNUSABLE. EXTREMELY AGGRAVATING. USING AT&T MOBILE TRANSFER (OR TRYING TO)
customer_reviews.author: RICK A

customer_reviews.title: Good working phone
customer_reviews.text: I gave one less star due to issues with seeing multimedia messages even when turning on the mobile data, maybe I am missing something. Otherwise I am very satisfied with phone to do all the stuff I need it to do. It arrived early and was exactly as celluarprofessor describes the condition to be. The battery life is good and charges quickly. It is like my old Samsung mini but a slightly more upgraded version so the features and navigation was easily figured out and intuitive. Overall 4 stars!
customer_reviews.author: Joanna

customer_reviews.title: Defective on arrival, didn't arrive on time either
customer_reviews.text: Defective on arrival, didn't arrive on time either, 4 days late. Had to go to AT&T store to activate and transfer info from other phone to this phone and activate, then once I found out phone was defective I had to back to the AT&T store to get everything back off and buy a brand new phone because I needed one immediately.
customer_reviews.author: C. Ramos

customer_reviews.title: ok''refurbished' phone bad charging port
customer_reviews.text: good phone with the exception on the charging port being in barely usable shape. had to buy a qi wireless charger just to charge the unit reliably. the seller was willing to credit the unit but by this point the phone data, images etc were transferred and only kept the unit so we wouldn't hare to invest the time to do this again.
customer_reviews.author: ELKYLE

customer_reviews.title: Works the way it should
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, it does works well and this phone is durable.
customer_reviews.author: BDH

customer_reviews.title: Came in the mail fast and it works great! I am going on my 6th month of ...
customer_reviews.text: Came in the mail fast and it works great! I am going on my 6th month of use. Ive dropped it a couple times and it held up! I bought a Unicorn beetle case for it and I am very happy with my purchase! I use my phone constantly! Battery is good and operating system is good. This is my 2nd try at ordering a phone on Amazon! This company did great
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Love this phone
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this phone! I had one previously and when the screen finally cracked (after multiple drops and no case or screen protector on it) I had to get another one. Forget all the fancy things on newer phones, I haven't found any phone to match the durability of this one. This time I put a screen protector on it at least. 😁
customer_reviews.author: LisaP

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with product. Won't turn on.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the phone from Sikksound and have only had the phone for 6 months. I've taken great care of the phone, and out of nowhere it buzzed and shut off. The phone had 63% battery, wasn't dropped, wasn't exposed to water. It won't turn on. Tried trouble shooting, nothing is working.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great phone. Better than expected.
customer_reviews.text: Great item, better than described, and sold as s refurb and it is like a brand new phone. I love it. LOVE IT. Insanely durable and better than expected. I work for AT&T and chose to buy my phone that I wanted to carry instead of the phone they give me. This was a worthy investment. And Amazon delivered it same day in like 4 hours. Insane.
customer_reviews.author: Daryl

customer_reviews.title: Great phone at a great price
customer_reviews.text: I was sick and tired of my iPhones. The worthless updates that never worked right and how it would stop working with peripherals is why I made the switch. This phone has just as many features and was a fraction of the price.
customer_reviews.author: The Nelsons

customer_reviews.title: A Reliable Phone
customer_reviews.text: I got this phone because it was recommended to my by people who had already owned it. It has a good amount of memory and it's easy to use.

customer_reviews.text: It was nice while it lasted and then it Started to glitch

customer_reviews.title: I know it's an old Phone but i loved by Galaxy %a and the 6a is even better
customer_reviews.text: Product is great and i would buy from these guys again in a heartbeat, i got what I ordered in the condition expected but it arrived way earlier than expected (bonus!)

customer_reviews.title: Great all around phone
customer_reviews.text: I love this phone. Better battery life than my S5, and I love the physical buttons. Faster than may last few android phones as well. The blue camo is also a nice touch. I was worried it would be too much, but it is subtle enough to not be a major issue.
customer_reviews.author: AG

customer_reviews.title: Too fragile
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY! Screen has broken twice in 10 months while in a case, when falling from less than 4'. This "Active" phone will not last. $250 per screen replacement.

customer_reviews.title: its all so tiresome
customer_reviews.text: they sent me one with an invoice for a cheaper phone than i had paid for (89 vs 130), the one i got would only run for 5 minutes then battery would crash. good site to buy phones for parts , but deceptive advertising and not a great seller.

customer_reviews.title: not happy
customer_reviews.text: worked fine for the first week then started to have problems batter goes from 100% to 0 ,turns on an off and stays off for days even at 100% batter life

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking phone but shuts off after charging
customer_reviews.text: Phone came on June 3rd .I recieved a call on June 8 while on vaction from my daughter that the phone would shut off after being charged to 100 % .,Then it wouldn't turn back on. Im waiting to see if the seller will exchange or if I'll be getting a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great phone - nice condition.
customer_reviews.text: Phone arrived quickly and works perfectly. There was a minor scuff on the back but I don't care and saved a ton of money compared to new at the AT&T store. Totally happy with it. S6 Active is awesome esp. Compared to my 3 yrs old Motorola Android.

However, I purchased 2 from this particular seller & had to return both of them. The phones seemed to work fine at first, but randomly, a phone call would provide loud static to the person on the other end of the call.

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: These phones are refurbish and they are no good my screen was broken

customer_reviews.title: Phone Stopped Functioning after couple weeks
customer_reviews.text: Used for (3) weeks. After two weeks camera started making noise. After (3) weeks screen went completely black. Phone is working based indicator light and notification vibration but screen is completely black and not working. This can't be a new phone as advertised.

customer_reviews.title: Phone died on last day I could return it.
customer_reviews.text: The phone screen went bright white then black and would never come back on. The phone was never dropped or abused. These phones are great but this one was a lemon. Expensive for only working 30 days.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Rankin

customer_reviews.title: BATTERY LIFE SUCKS!!!!!!!!!

customer_reviews.title: Make sure when ordering any phones you check which version it is
customer_reviews.text: I already have a Galaxy S-6 Active and wanted one the same. Apparently the one I ordered was a different version so it does not work as well. In my area I get no service in the lower version

customer_reviews.title: Not good.
customer_reviews.text: Ever since I got this phone I get cut in and put reception randomly as I wouldn't with my past phone. As well as my other phone has a 2600 mahs battery. This phone has a 3500 mahs battery. My other phone lasts all day while on messenger and Facebook. This phone isn't even lasting 3 hours. I baught it refurbished so it shouldn't have a bad battery on bad phone reception.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars

customer_reviews.title: I purchase this phone with the intent to add a ...
customer_reviews.text: I purchase this phone with the intent to add a line to my cricket wireless account. It turns out that the phone is on the national stolen or lost list. So the company can't activate it. So if your purchase this phone to open an account for another wireless company it won't let you.

customer_reviews.title: Overall good phone
customer_reviews.text: Be prepared for scratches on case, screen and minor damage. On mine the active button was broken. I have loved it overall. AT&T switched it over no issues. Worked great.

customer_reviews.text: The phone is great, the battery life leaves a bit to be desired, but all n all happy with the phone.

customer_reviews.title: very satisfied

customer_reviews.title: seller bayshine store
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described, used in good condition. Arrived 3 days early, and packaged well. I was worried with reviews saying they received clones, the 1st thing I did was check the operating system & download an app to pull the hardware information to verify authenticity. No issues and the phone works/looks great!
customer_reviews.author: joe

customer_reviews.title: Bought the phone before rearing the reviews. Product is ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought the phone before rearing the reviews. Product is clearly a fake. Even the box has SPELLING ERRORS on it. If it was half the price and had an honest description stating this is a new imitation s6 active I might have given it 2 stars, but this is borderline fraudulent. DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: Roxanne

customer_reviews.title: Phone works great, charges quickly and the battery lasts way longer ...
customer_reviews.text: I've had this phone for a month now and when I got it, it had a few scratches around the corners but I didn't mind. Phone works great, charges quickly and the battery lasts way longer than all the phones I've had. Also, I went to the beach and it fell in the water so I was afraid it wouldn't work the same but the phone is still running great. I'm happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Only complaint was that the charger that came with the phone wasn't for an s6 but other than that... works great and looks great!

customer_reviews.title: The phone is good and all
customer_reviews.text: The phone is good and all, but even in a protective case upon a small drop the screen broke and I am now unable to use the phone. My older phones including the S3 stood up to much more than the S6 Active.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!!!! What a steal!
customer_reviews.text: This phone was a steal! Can't even tell it's been used. Bought 2 months ago writing this review after 2 months use. I love this phone! No issues. Great camera.
customer_reviews.author: Kayla

customer_reviews.title: Good product. Just as it said it was. Works flawlessly.
customer_reviews.text: Received in original box phone seems to work as it should. This replaced a S7 which was a really bad experience.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: The phone died after a few short months. Get a warranty when purchasing.

customer_reviews.title: Arrived in perfect condition
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful phone, sturdy, great value. My husband needed a replacement phone quickly and this was perfect

customer_reviews.title: The person I bought it from has answered my emails and was very helpful and nice.
customer_reviews.text: I was apprehensive about buying a phone online and have only had it a week, but seems to be doing really well so far. The person I bought it from has answered my emails and was very helpful and nice.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Lanners

customer_reviews.title: Try something else.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this phone for exactly three months. The software never updates properly, and now the screen just went black. The phone still receives calls and messages but the screen remains inactive. Tried every trick in the book.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely the best! Easy to use, takes fantastic pictures & perfect for those who use smart phones.

customer_reviews.title: Super fast shipping

customer_reviews.title: This phone is perfect for the job

customer_reviews.title: Product received exactly as advertised Very pleased and arrived earlier than expected

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: excellent condition as described what more could you ask for

customer_reviews.title: Broke after one year. No physical damage. No ...
customer_reviews.text: Broke after one year. No physical damage. No repair place knows what's wrong with it, but will cost too much to fix.

customer_reviews.title: Not new.  Problems getting LTE service and making calls.
customer_reviews.text: This phone is as specified in terms of memory and description, although I think that it is used or refurbished, *not* new. (The camera lens is scratched.) I have been having lots of problems getting this phone setup to use LTE and make phone calls reliably. I did activate it at my local ATT store. I will almost surely be returning it. Too bad I bought this just prior a spring break trip. I did try the APN setting suggestions that the seller provided which seemed to help with the LTE connection, but not with phone call issues.
customer_reviews.author: bbneo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Everything is as expected, no surprises. The phone works extremely well and I have nothing to complain about.

customer_reviews.text: I loved the phone but the texting was terrible. Texts weren't received by many people. Antenna reception was terrible!

customer_reviews.text: The phone was great for all of two days and now it can't seem to hold a charge and shuts itself of regardless of what the battery percentage says.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Battery Started holding less charge after 2 months of use and also slowing down.

customer_reviews.title: SELLER ONLY GIVES 30 DAY WARRANTY. SUCKS.
customer_reviews.text: ONLY HAD THIS PHONE 3.5 MONTHS AND THE SCREEN TURNED BLUE. NOT RECOMMENDED.

customer_reviews.title: Some scratches on the front--no big deal. The thing ...
customer_reviews.text: Some scratches on the front--no big deal. The thing that bothers me is that sometimes the sound is garbled. Mostly happens on the ring tone and other alerts, but also once in awhile when I'm talking on the phone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Was sent completely non functioning phone. Microphone does not work.

customer_reviews.text: got this for my wife. it didn't come with instructions so I had my son set it up. now my wife really loves it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Refurbished with inferior glass.  DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: At the time of purchase there was no indication that this would be a refurbished phone. This phone came in an open box with a new power adapter and no paperwork. Comparing side by side with a retail version of the phone the glass looks cheap and seems to have been replaced. This phone shattered with minimal impact a week after purchase. My retail version of this phone is heavier with thicker glass and has taken far worse hits. This product was not as advertised. I'm very disappointed.

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with this product.
customer_reviews.text: I like the galaxy active phones but this one has issues. bluetooth fails, updates not installing, camera acting up in low light. Not happy with it.

customer_reviews.text: Camera goes whacky sometimes and not the best quality, but a great durable phone

customer_reviews.title: While I did read the review you on this unit ...
customer_reviews.text: While I did read the review you on this unit before I purchased it I took my chances despite some negative reviews. I have been using my unit for 3 months now and it has performed well. I'm able to use my XM Pandora take pictures send video and talk to people without a problem whatsoever. Hi have not gotten the phone wet and my only complaint would be that my OtterBox May cover my mic when I try to use the speaker mode.

customer_reviews.title: Otherwise it doesn't look like a used phone
customer_reviews.text: Only problem I have with this is that it gets excessively hot sometimes. Otherwise it doesn't look like a used phone. No wears or marks. Really passed my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: cheyas

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: I had this a and it cut off and every day have to keep reseting it ever day

customer_reviews.title: Get it for the processing power and battery life
customer_reviews.text: Best value I could find on a phone with great CPU power and battery life. I would recommend it for anyone. Being "Active", it also is supposed to be very water resistant. So that's another plus. I also got it because it's such a popular phone, I knew there would be third party ROMS for it if I wanted to do that later.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars

customer_reviews.text: So far it's been a great phone for my 17 yr old. He loves it.

customer_reviews.title: Faulty Phone
customer_reviews.text: This product came to me with issues. From the day I got it the screen would freeze and the phone would restart about once a week. I waited until the new software came out to rule out the software issue. Once I downloaded the new software I was still having issues with it freezing and restarting until eventually about 3 weeks after having it, it froze and wouldn't turn back on...

customer_reviews.title: Extremley happy
customer_reviews.text: Loved it! Came in perfect condition and not a thing wrong with it.

customer_reviews.title: Product arrived defective, this was a refurbished phone.
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived defective and developed a purple black spot that spread over the whole screen.
customer_reviews.author: RSC

customer_reviews.title: A phone for a real hotboy
customer_reviews.text: It's durable but I question the validity of the water proof-ness... The phone kept thinking it was docking and undocking while taking a shower. Overall good phone with nice response time, a little laggy here and there and some freezing every now and then but the phone can still delivery some good hotboy quality
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Buiciuc

customer_reviews.title: Very good device I loved it
customer_reviews.text: Very good device I loved it , good conditions and it works great just as new Definitely would recommend it!
